 2024-07552024-06-21DND
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of ROBYN HYNES of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, as interim Ombusdperson for the Department of National Defence and the Canadian Armed Forces, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of one year, effective July 2, 2024.
